name: Send FireText messages from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a source Google Sheets spreadsheet and sends FireText messages based on the retrieved row information (from, to, message).

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ps7zzd0b_lenAtx2rXjPXxhQe3S1blS14dGn-2FN0eA/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
